sect1.title: Change Font Size Directly
sect1.para: If you want to change the font size directly, insert a dbfo font-size="SIZE" processing instruction into the respective verbatim element:
This is used if you want to change the font size for only one verbatim element, but leave the others intact.

sect1.title: Change Font Size as Upper Element
sect1.para: If you want to change the font size for consecutive verbatim elements, position the dbfo font-size="SIZE" processing instruction outside the verbatim element:
Any following verbatim elements will use the parent PI. This is used if you want to change the font size for more than one verbatim elements. To reset the font size, use dbfo font-size="".
